body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Jane A. Pirtle. Father of Alfred Pirtle, Ella Pirtle, James S. Pirtle, Jane Pirtle, Harriet K. Pirtle, and Elizabeth A. Pirtle. Admitted to the bar in 1819. Appointed Circuit Court Judge in Louisville in 1829 and again in 1846. Elected State Senator in 1840. Appointed chancellor of the Louisville Chancery Court in 1850 and 1862. Professor of constitutional law, equity, and commercial law at the University of Louisville for twenty-seven years.
